body_html:
They both don't change numel. In the second example, we have

view:       2
size:    1, 2
stride:  1, 0

The "contiguous" chunk here is all dimensions, i.e., [1, 2]. "numel" in this chunk is exactly the same as "numel" of the view chunk [2].
body_text:
They both don't change numel. In the second example, we have
view:       2
size:    1, 2
stride:  1, 0

The "contiguous" chunk here is all dimensions, i.e., [1, 2]. "numel" in this chunk is exactly the same as "numel" of the view chunk [2].
body:
They both don't change numel. In the second example, we have 
```
view:       2
size:    1, 2
stride:  1, 0
```
The "contiguous" chunk here is all dimensions, i.e., `[1, 2]`. "numel" in this chunk is exactly the same as "numel" of the view chunk `[2]`.
